description: {"blocks":[{"key":"cmjbm","text":"Protocol for field based sampling of bacterial biomass or environmental DNA (eDNA) using Sterivex filters and syringes.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
materials_text: {"blocks":[{"key":"1aehc","text":"1.\tSingle use 60 ml Luer lock syringe (Fisherbrand 14955461)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"508ln","text":"2.\tSingle use 2.5 ml syringe (BD Plastipak 300185)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"d024l","text":"3.\tOne single use 0.22 µm Sterivex filter cartridge (Millipore SVGPL10RC)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"2k511","text":"4.\tTwo Luer-lock end caps for the filter cartridge in a small plastic bag (Cole-Parmer 45504-56 and 45501-28).","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"d676o","text":"5.\tOne 5 ml plastic screw top vial containing 2 ml of Zymo DNA/RNA Shield (Zymo R1100-250)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"20aj1","text":"6.\t50 ml centrifuge tube (Starlab E1450-0500)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"54q55","text":"7.\tOne pair of nitrile gloves (Medium)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

status.info: We use this protocol and it’s working

steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"4df64","text":"Open sampling pack and put gloves on.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"kld5","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"ba4q","text":"  ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"5m8jp","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"image","mutability":"","data":{"guid":"39DB35903ECC11EBB88FB1B2F1CDC06C","height":412,"id":230601,"is_video":false,"legend":{"blocks":[{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"ceatl","text":"Fig 1. Sample pack contents","type":"unstyled"}],"entityMap":{}},"mime":"image/jpeg","nestedSelector":null,"original_name":"Sample pack.jpg","placeholder":"https://s3.amazonaws.com/protocols-files/private/78b6b4e7df18491b7c2d0520b4c5985bbfb00db97076978d9af19b0996049f65/ctrf59we.jpg","shadow":false,"source":"https://s3.amazonaws.com/protocols-files/files/hbgj59we.jpg","webp_source":"https://s3.amazonaws.com/protocols-files/files/hbgi59we.webp","width":550}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"8ron2","text":"Take the   syringe and Sterivex filter out of the packaging.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":9,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"9kbc9","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"60","guid":"D24EEF803EC511EBBD5535096CA02C50","id":0,"label":"","unit":2}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"df4hs","text":"Fill the syringe with   of water to be sampled (either directly from the water source or collected in a clean sampling container that has been thoroughly rinsed with water from the sampling site).","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":22,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"6d8fj","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"","data":{"amount":"60","guid":"DC7D98303EC511EBBD5535096CA02C50","id":0,"label":"","unit":2}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"1uaq1","text":"Connect the syringe full of water to the luer lock end of the filter unit by twisting.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"16hr1","text":"Use the syringe plunger to force the water through the filter unit.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"8it49","text":" ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"1jpqr","text":"  ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"4qs59","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"ebvsi","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":1,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"6g4l3","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"image","mutability":"","data":{"guid":"B099C9003EC511EBBD5535096CA02C50","height":356,"id":230603,"is_video":false,"legend":{"blocks":[{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"6n7t3","text":"Fig    2: Assembled syringe and filtration unit.","type":"unstyled"}],"entityMap":{}},"mime":"image/png","original_name":"image.png","placeholder":"https://s3.amazonaws.com/protocols-files/public/78b6b4e7df18491b7c2d0520b4c5985bbfb00db97076978d9af19b0996049f65/ctrb59we.png","source":"https://s3.amazonaws.com/protocols-files/files/hbgm59we.jpg","type":1,"webp_source":"https://s3.amazonaws.com/protocols-files/files/hbgk59we.webp","width":268}},"1":{"type":"safety","mutability":"","data":{"blocks":[{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"atoq4","text":"CAUTION: As pressure is being applied, take appropriate precautions (i.e. wear eye protection and point the filter at ground whilst filtering)","type":"unstyled"}],"entityMap":{}}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"f460e","text":"Refill the syringe and repeat this process until no more water can be filtered through the unit (a reasonable pressure can be applied, but be careful to not apply excessive force). Expect between    and  , depending on water turbidity.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":196,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":203,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"d5meg","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"60","guid":"03B173E03EC611EBBD5535096CA02C50","id":0,"label":"","unit":2}},"1":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"600","guid":"0A5C25F03EC611EBBD5535096CA02C50","id":0,"label":"","unit":2}}}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"8p0vl","text":"Record the volume of water that passed through the filter in ml.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"dvd2f","text":"Fill the   syringe with air, reattach to the filter unit and expel any remaining water in the filter unit by forcing the air through. Dispose of the   syringe.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":9,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":149,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"rqul","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"","data":{"amount":"60","guid":"119E84203EC611EBBD5535096CA02C50","id":0,"label":"","unit":2}},"1":{"type":"amount","mutability":"","data":{"amount":"60","guid":"179A31803EC611EBBD5535096CA02C50","id":0,"label":"","unit":2}}}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"c1i4f","text":"Add the end cap to the outlet of the filter unit by twisting it on.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"68ke5","text":"Attach the 2.5 ml syringe to the inlet of the syringe filter and holding upright (syringe on top), add the Zymo DNA/RNA shield to the filter vial by depressing the syringe plunger. Allow the syringe to refill with air, remove and dispose of the empty syringe.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"52itp","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"8m31u","text":"  ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"94f3","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"image","mutability":"","data":{"guid":"B99437703EC511EBBD5535096CA02C50","height":352,"id":230605,"is_video":false,"legend":{"blocks":[{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"3cd0u","text":"Figure 3. Adding sample preservative to the filter unit.","type":"unstyled"}],"entityMap":{}},"mime":"image/png","original_name":"image.png","placeholder":"https://s3.amazonaws.com/protocols-files/public/78b6b4e7df18491b7c2d0520b4c5985bbfb00db97076978d9af19b0996049f65/ctrc59we.png","source":"https://s3.amazonaws.com/protocols-files/files/hbgp59we.jpg","type":1,"webp_source":"https://s3.amazonaws.com/protocols-files/files/hbgn59we.webp","width":265}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"6olk1","text":"Remove the   syringe from its packaging and fill with Zymo DNA/RNA shield from the   vial. Dispose of the empty vial.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":11,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":83,"length":1}],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"","data":{"amount":"2.5","guid":"AF47D8A37B3411EBB2400A58A9FEAC2A","id":0,"label":"","unit":2}},"1":{"type":"amount","mutability":"","data":{"amount":"5","guid":"AF47D9A47B3411EBB2400A58A9FEAC2A","id":0,"label":"","unit":2}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"bjlvi","text":"Cap the inlet of the filter unit with the other cap to seal in the preservative.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"9vgpg","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"5mlfk","text":"  ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"6c08h","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"image","mutability":"","data":{"guid":"BF21E0C03EC511EBBD5535096CA02C50","height":265,"id":230607,"is_video":false,"legend":{"blocks":[{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"653tf","text":"Fig 4. Sealer filter unit with preservative.","type":"unstyled"}],"entityMap":{}},"mime":"image/png","original_name":"image.png","placeholder":"https://s3.amazonaws.com/protocols-files/public/78b6b4e7df18491b7c2d0520b4c5985bbfb00db97076978d9af19b0996049f65/ctrd59we.png","source":"https://s3.amazonaws.com/protocols-files/files/hbgr59we.jpg","type":1,"webp_source":"https://s3.amazonaws.com/protocols-files/files/hbgq59we.webp","width":353}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"e2vl2","text":"Ensure the caps are on tightly and place the filter unit in the labelled 50 ml plastic centrifuge tube.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"8fipl","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"7065v","text":"  ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"62k0g","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"image","mutability":"","data":{"guid":"C50DAFA03EC511EBBD5535096CA02C50","height":352,"id":230609,"is_video":false,"legend":{"blocks":[{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"cvnbj","text":"Fig 5. Filter unit inside 50 ml tube.","type":"unstyled"}],"entityMap":{}},"mime":"image/png","original_name":"image.png","placeholder":"https://s3.amazonaws.com/protocols-files/public/78b6b4e7df18491b7c2d0520b4c5985bbfb00db97076978d9af19b0996049f65/ctre59we.png","source":"https://s3.amazonaws.com/protocols-files/files/hbgt59we.jpg","type":1,"webp_source":"https://s3.amazonaws.com/protocols-files/files/hbgs59we.webp","width":265}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"am4i","text":"Store the filter unit at  , or at the very least keep at   and out of direct sunlight, until returning to the laboratory. Once in the laboratory, store at -20 °C until shipping and analysis.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":25,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":57,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"5dsaj","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"42rrh","text":"Shipping of samples can be performed at room temperature, although cooled (   or    shipping is preferred.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":2,"offset":75,"length":1},{"key":3,"offset":81,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"1opcj","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"temperature","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"error_temperature":false,"guid":"08C3B9A07B3511EBA2441D8056033BFF","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"temperature":"-20","unit":10}},"1":{"type":"temperature","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"error_temperature":false,"guid":"0539F6A07B3511EBA2441D8056033BFF","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"temperature":"4","unit":10}},"2":{"type":"temperature","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"error_temperature":false,"guid":"1D4730A07B3511EBA2441D8056033BFF","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"temperature":"4","unit":10}},"3":{"type":"temperature","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"error_temperature":false,"guid":"0C6104A07B3511EBA2441D8056033BFF","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"temperature":"-20","unit":10}}}}
